search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for ReCharge (recharge.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Recharge is available at: [https://rechargepayments.com/pricing](https://rechargepayments.com/pricing)【3:3†source】.

citations.title: Pricing - Standard, Pro, and Custom Pricing Plans - Recharge

Pricing - Standard, Pro, and Custom Pricing Plans - Recharge
===============

  

[Skip to content](https://rechargepayments.com/pricing#primary) [Skip to footer](https://rechargepayments.com/pricing#colophon)

[![Image 3: Recharge](https://getrecharge.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/recharge-logo-full.svg)](https://getrecharge.com/)

[Login](https://admin.rechargeapps.com/admin/login) [Get started](https://rechargepayments.com/pricing#modal-main)

*   Platform
    
    *   [Overview](https://rechargepayments.com/pricing#)
        *   [SubscriptionsPredictable revenue, loyal customers](https://rechargepayments.com/products/subscriptions/)
        *   [Revenue toolsConvert & retain subscribers](https://rechargepayments.com/products/revenue-tools/)

*   Solutions

[Login](https://admin.rechargeapps.com/admin/login) [Get started](https://rechargepayments.com/pricing#modal-main)

When you have the right tools, things come naturally
====================================================

Whether you’re an industry leader or destined to become one, you’ll grow sales sustainably with Recharge.

Starter

$99/mo

1.25% + 19¢ per transaction

[Get started](https://rechargepayments.com/pricing#modal-main)

Who is this plan for?

Our Starter plan is for merchants who want to launch subscription offerings quickly and easily.

All-in-one, no-code subscriptions with powerful retention and growth tools. Perfect for startups and subscription-curious brands.

What's inside

*   Subscription-first product page _widget_
    
    Acquire up to 8x more subscribers with a customized subscription widget.
    
*   Customizable customer _portal_
    
    Edit the look & feel of the customer portal with a no-code mobile-friendly interface & intuitive order management to optimize the customer experience.
    
*   Basic churn _tools_
    
    Reduce churn with basic cancellation, failed payment & win-back tools.
    
*   Basic upsell & cross-sell _tools_
    
    Increase subscription conversion & AOV with basic upsell & cross-sell tools across the customer journey.
    
*   Automated _workflows_
    
    Boost retention, conversion & CLV by streamlining key processes like welcome offers, starter-to-refill transitions & more.
    
*   Gifting _capabilities_
    
    Let customers gift subscriptions to family & friends.
    
*   Analytics & industry _benchmarks_
    
    Access detailed dashboards & compare performance against industry benchmarks.
    
*   Integrations with top ecommerce _tools_
    
    Connect Recharge with hundreds of top ecommerce tools.
    

Pro

$499/mo

1.25% + 19¢ per transaction

[Talk to us](https://rechargepayments.com/pricing#modal-pro)

Who is this plan for?

Our Pro plan is for merchants seeking to scale with advanced capabilities and further customization for their subscriptions.

Built for established brands. Unified tools for optimization and deep analysis improve retention, subscription conversion & AOV.

Everything in Starter, plus:

*   Smart cancellation _prevention_
    
    Leverage Recharge AI to identify patterns in cancellation reasons & surface actionable insights to reduce churn.
    
*   Customizable bundles & tiered _discounts_
    
    Craft curated product bundles to increase AOV.
    
*   A/B testing _tools_
    
    Test & refine post-purchase strategies, cancellation journeys, win-back campaigns & subscription widgets to drive more conversion.
    
*   Advanced upsell, cross-sell & win-back _analytics_
    
    Optimize your upsell, cross-sell & win-back strategies with deeper insights.
    
*   Javascript SDK & storefront _API_
    
    Create highly personalized subscription experiences by seamlessly integrating Recharge into your storefront.
    

Custom

Volume-based rates

[Request pricing](https://rechargepayments.com/pricing#modal-custom)

Who is this plan for?

Our Custom plan is for large-scale merchants who are looking for volume-discount pricing, dedicated implementation support & tailored pricing.

This robust option for subscription enterprises comes with hands-on support and a direct connection to our subscription experts.

Everything in Pro, plus:

*   Premium support with 4-hour response time
    
*   Early access to new products & features
    
*   Dedicated implementation team
    

Add-ons

Slash churn, lift LTR. These pay for themselves.

Concierge SMS For all plans

Boost LTR 30% with text-based subscription management backed by our AI concierge. No robotic responses here—our concierge reads people, not scripts, for natural conversation.

Retain For Pro & Custom plans only

Loyalty (Rewards & Referrals)

Retain existing customers, attract new ones, and maximize LTR with customized rewards and referral programs that incentivize loyalty.

Advanced Failed Payment Recovery

Recover up to 88% of failed payments with the smart recovery solution powered by data from 20,000 brands and 1.3 million daily transactions.

![Image 4](https://getrecharge.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/hellobello-logo.svg)

Pro

Custom

Starter

$99/mo

1.25% + 19¢ per transaction

Pro
---

$499/mo

1% + 19¢ per transaction

Custom
------

Custom pricing

Tailored plan & rates

### Recurring billing engine

#### Multi-currency

Multi-currency allows merchants to sell to their international customers in local currencies, regardless of the store’s default currency.

![Image 34: Multi-currency included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 35: Multi-currency included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 36: Multi-currency included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Native discounts, tax, and shipping

Recharge offers out-of-box discount, tax, and shipping solutions. You can use ours or integrate us with tools you already use.

![Image 37: Native discounts, tax, and shipping included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 38: Native discounts, tax, and shipping included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 39: Native discounts, tax, and shipping included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Prepaids

![Image 40: Prepaids included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 41: Prepaids included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 42: Prepaids included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Unified checkout (Shopify, BigCommerce)

We integrate with all popular ecommerce platforms like Shopify and BigCommerce. You can also use our APIs to build integrations with other ecommerce platforms.

![Image 43: Unified checkout included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 44: Unified checkout included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 45: Unified checkout included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

### Merchant tools

#### Merchant admin portal

This is where you’ll manage all your Recharge configurations.

![Image 46: Merchant admin portal included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 47: Merchant admin portal included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 48: Merchant admin portal included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Third-party integrations library

Integrate with all the major tools you already use to power your business.

![Image 49: Third-party integrations library included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 50: Third-party integrations library included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 51: Third-party integrations library included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Permissions management

Manage what each admin/team member can access within the Recharge merchant portal.

![Image 52: Permissions management included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 53: Permissions management included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 54: Permissions management included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Bulk manage subscriptions

Merchants can update subscriptions in bulk to make fast updates at scale.

![Image 55: Bulk manage subscriptions included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 56: Bulk manage subscriptions included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 57: Bulk manage subscriptions included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Robust and flexible API

![Image 58: Robust and flexible API included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 59: Robust and flexible API included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 60: Robust and flexible API included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Javascript SDK

Developers can use pre-made functions and fully-typed SDK to easily build custom subscriber-facing experiences on any technology framework.

![Image 61: Javascript SDK not included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/x-thin.svg)

![Image 62: Javascript SDK included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 63: Javascript SDK included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Storefront API access

Developers can securely access our API on any browser for building subscriber-facing experiences and applications without servers or interstitial layers.

![Image 64: Storefront API access not included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/x-thin.svg)

![Image 65: Storefront API access included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 66: Storefront API access included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Custom checkout domain\*

Own the full shopping experience with your own checkout domain (not available for Shopify Checkout).

![Image 67: Custom checkout domain* not included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/x-thin.svg)

![Image 68: Custom checkout domain* included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 69: Custom checkout domain* included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Fully integrated bundling solution

Combine multiple SKUs into a single sellable product.

![Image 70: Fully integrated bundling solution not included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/x-thin.svg)

![Image 71: Fully integrated bundling solution included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 72: Fully integrated bundling solution included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Configurable rate limits

Access higher rate limits to support your growing usage of the Recharge API.

![Image 73: Configurable rate limits not included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/x-thin.svg)

![Image 74: Configurable rate limits included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 75: Configurable rate limits included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Google Tag Manager\*

![Image 76: Google Tag Manager* not included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/x-thin.svg)

![Image 77: Google Tag Manager* included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 78: Google Tag Manager* included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

### Shopper tools

#### Out-of-the-box customer portal themes

We offer an out-of-box portal for your customers to manage their subscription.

![Image 79: Out-of-the-box customer portal themes included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 80: Out-of-the-box customer portal themes included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 81: Out-of-the-box customer portal themes included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Passwordless login

Customers can easily login to their customer portal with a 4-digit authentication code sent via SMS or email.

![Image 82: Passwordless login included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 83: Passwordless login included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 84: Passwordless login included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Add one-time products to a subscription order

![Image 85: Add one-time products to a subscription order included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 86: Add one-time products to a subscription order included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 87: Add one-time products to a subscription order included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Pause, skip, or reschedule deliveries

Allowing your customers to easily pause, skip, or reschedule deliveries helps increase LTV.

![Image 88: Pause, skip, or reschedule deliveries included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 89: Pause, skip, or reschedule deliveries included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 90: Pause, skip, or reschedule deliveries included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Swap products

Allowing your customers to easily swap for a different product in their subscription helps increase LTV.

![Image 91: Swap products included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 92: Swap products included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 93: Swap products included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Shopper notifications via SMS and/or email

Let your customers manage their subscriptions via text to add on products, swap items, and more.

![Image 94: Shopper notifications via SMS and/or email included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 95: Shopper notifications via SMS and/or email included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 96: Shopper notifications via SMS and/or email included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Gift a skipped shipment

Retain revenue by enabling your customers to send a skipped subscription order as a one-time gift.

![Image 97: Gift a skipped shipment included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 98: Gift a skipped shipment included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 99: Gift a skipped shipment included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Affinity customer portal

This theme offers no-code customizations, a mobile-friendly interface, and intuitive order management to optimize your customer experience.

![Image 100: Affinity customer portal included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 101: Affinity customer portal included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 102: Affinity customer portal included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Gift subscriptions

Enable your customers to gift subscriptions to their friends and family. The gift recipient can redeem the gift without entering payment details and manage their own subscription experience.

![Image 103: Gift subscriptions included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 104: Gift subscriptions included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 105: Gift subscriptions included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Customer portal extensions (e.g upsell carousels, custom content, etc.)

Merchants on the Pro and Custom plans will also have access to powerful extensions, which broaden the functionality of the customer portal with options for low-code customizations.

![Image 106: Customer portal extensions not included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/x-thin.svg)

![Image 107: Customer portal extensions included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 108: Customer portal extensions included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Enhanced customizable customer portal themes

You can fully customize the shopping experience your customers will have.

![Image 109: Enhanced customizable customer portal themes not included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/x-thin.svg)

![Image 110: Enhanced customizable customer portal themes included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 111: Enhanced customizable customer portal themes included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

#### Custom domains on customer portal

Extend your brand identity and memorability to your customer portal with a custom domain.

![Image 112: Custom domains on customer portal not included in standard plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/x-thin.svg)

![Image 113: Custom domains on customer portal included in pro plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

![Image 114: Custom domains on customer portal included in custom plan](https://rechargepayments.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/check-mark.svg)

### Analytics dashboards

#### Revenue overview

Recharge for Enterprise

The world's largest brands are powered by Recharge. Our API-first subscription management platform includes powerful customization tools, a 24/7 Security and Compliance team, dedicated support and implentation, and a vast ecosystem of integration partners.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

### When does the 60-day trial period for the Starter plan begin?

The 60-day trial period for the Starter plan begins on the day you install the Recharge app for your store.

### When does billing begin, and what is the billing cycle?

You will not be charged any fees during your trial period. After the trial is over, your recurring billing cycle will begin. Recharge follows a monthly billing cycle. You will be billed after the first full billing cycle you complete, not including the free trial period.

### How does pricing work?

Depending on the plan you select, your total monthly charges will include a fixed monthly fee, plus variable fees based on your usage in the most recent billing cycle. Please review the pricing plans to compare your options.

### How is usage-based pricing calculated?

Usage fees differ by plan and apply to all transactions processed by Recharge per month. A “transaction” is an order that has a subscription product and includes mixed cart scenario where a consumer has both a subscription product and a one-time product in the order.

### Is the pricing for Recharge distinct from ecommerce platform fees?

Yes. All pricing for Recharge is in addition to any other services or solutions your store may utilize, such as your ecommerce platform, payment processor, and any other ecommerce applications.

### Is pricing for Recharge any different for merchants on Shopify Plus?

Merchants using Shopify Plus may be eligible for discounted pricing through our Custom plan. Please [contact our Sales team](https://rechargepayments.com/talk-to-sales/) for more information.

### Can I negotiate a lower usage fee for my store?

Yes. Through the Custom plan, tailored pricing, which includes discounts, is available to merchants with high [processing](https://rechargepayments.com/glossary/order-processing/) volumes. To learn more, please [contact our Sales team](https://rechargepayments.com/talk-to-sales/).

Join the platform trusted by leading DTC brands to process more than $20 billion in revenue

All fees, including monthly subscription fees, will be billed in US dollars and are subject to government tax and other prevailing charges.

Cookie preference center
------------------------

Recharge does not use cookies for any purpose other than the ones outlined in our cookie policy. By accepting all cookies, you agree that cookies may be placed on your computer or internet-enabled device. Please note that our cookie policy only applies to visitors of the Recharge homepage and does not apply to the dashboard for merchants.  
[Read cookie policy](https://rechargepayments.com/cookies/)

Allow all

### Manage consent preferences

#### Strictly necessary

Always active

These cookies are necessary to allow the technical operation of our services (e.g., they enable you to move around on a website and to use its features).

#### Functionality/performance

 Functionality/performance

These cookies help us understand how our services are performing and being used. These cookies may work with web beacons included in emails we send to track which emails are opened and which links are clicked by recipients.

#### Ad targeting

 Ad targeting

These cookies are used by advertising companies or marketing tools to collect information about how you use our Website over time. These companies use this information to show you ads they believe will be relevant to you within our services and elsewhere, to measure how the ads perform, and to enable session-specific features.

#### Internal marketing

 Internal marketing

These cookies are collected on our Website by third-party companies for the sole purpose of providing marketing insights and services to us internally.
